sentences.sContent: Malcolm believed he was guilty of duplicity in his private dealings.
sentences.sCn: 马尔科姆相信他在为其私底下行为的奸诈内疚着。

synos.tran: 口是心非；表里不一；不诚实

remMethod.val: du(二) + plic(重叠) + ity → 有两种(态度) → 口是心非

trans.tranCn: 奸诈, 狡猾, 搞两面派, 口是心非, 不诚实, 表里不一
trans.tranOther: dishonest behaviour that is intended to deceive someone
